oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Daily Rebel Banner newspaper, December 13, 1862, issue
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pro-Confederate newspaper published on the run in Tennessee in advance of Federal occupation. This particular issue was published in Murfreesboro, Tenn., reporting on war news and the presence of CSA President Jefferson Davis, who was in town. Basically a military paper, it travelled with Gen. Bragg's Army of Tennessee as it moved through the state.
